channel.title: [Delta] How to fix up Skillcapes = Clue Scroll?
channel.description: I'm not sure if fixing this deals with the actual source files, or the client I'm using.(Galkon's Refactored) If anyone could give me direction on how to fix it up so I can use the skillcapes, please let me know! (I figure this was fixed in the actual Deltascape client, but I've yet to find it.)
